mapper.select: select * from Personnel p inner join personnelcompany pc on p.persid=pc.persid inner join company c on pc.Compid=c.Compid inner join personneldepartment pd on p.persid=pd.persid inner join department d on pd.Deptid=d.Deptid inner join departmentjop pj on p.persid =pj.persid inner join Jop j on pj.JopId=j.JopId

select *,c.compid as name,d.deptid as startTime,j.jopid as endTime from Personnel p inner join personnelcompany pc on p.persid=pc.persid inner join company c on pc.Compid=c.Compid inner join personneldepartment pd on p.persid=pd.persid inner join department d on pd.Deptid=d.Deptid inner join personneljop pj on p.persid =pj.persid inner join Jop j on pj.JopId=j.JopId where p.PersId =#{PersId}

select * from Personnel p inner join personnelcompany pc on p.persid=pc.persid inner join company c on pc.Compid=c.Compid inner join personneldepartment pd on p.persid=pd.persid inner join department d on pd.Deptid=d.Deptid inner join personneljop pj on p.persid =pj.persid inner join Jop j on pj.JopId=j.JopId where p.PersName like '%${PersName}%' limit #{page},#{limit}

select count(p.PersName) from Personnel p inner join personnelcompany pc on p.persid=pc.persid inner join company c on pc.Compid=c.Compid inner join personneldepartment pd on p.persid=pd.persid inner join department d on pd.Deptid=d.Deptid inner join personneljop pj on p.persid =pj.persid inner join Jop j on pj.JopId=j.JopId WHERE p.PersName like '%${PersName}%'

SELECT MAX(SUBSTR(PersCoding, -5))+1 FROM Personnel
insert into Personnel(PersId,PersCoding,PersName,WorkCenter,PersPassword,Sex,Phone ,Email,Hiredate) values (UUID(),#{PersCoding},#{PersName},#{PersPassword},#{WorkCenter} ,#{Sex},#{Phone},#{Email},now())
mapper.select: select * from Personnel where PersCoding=#{PersCoding} And PersPassword=#{PersPassword}
mapper.insert: insert into personnelcompany(PersId,Compid) values((SELECT PersId FROM personnel ORDER BY hiredate DESC LIMIT 0,1),#{name})
insert into personneldepartment(PersId,deptid) values((SELECT PersId FROM personnel ORDER BY hiredate DESC LIMIT 0,1),#{startTime})
insert into personneljop(PersId,jopid) values((SELECT PersId FROM personnel ORDER BY hiredate DESC LIMIT 0,1),#{endTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE personnelcompany SET compid=#{name} where persid=#{PersId}
UPDATE PersonnelDepartment SET deptid=#{startTime} where persid=#{PersId}
UPDATE PersonnelJop SET JopId=#{endTime} where persid=#{PersId}
